text: “Nena: “Takhulupirira Allah ndi zomwe zavumbulutsidwa pa ife, ndi zomwe zidavumbulutsidwa kwa Ibrahim, ndi Ismail, Ishâq ndi Yaqub ndi zidzukulu (zake), ndi zimene adapatsidwa Mûsa ndi Isa (Yesu), ndi aneneri (ena) zochokera kwa Mbuye wawo. Sitisiyanitsa aliyense pakati pawo, ndipo ife kwa Iye ndi Asilamu (odzipereka kwathunthu).”
